# MaterialParameterTypes.TriangleFillMode

**Enumeration**

An object that defines how the system rasterizes triangles and triangle strips

## Declaration

```swift
enum TriangleFillMode
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **MaterialParameterTypes.TriangleFillMode.fill**: Triangles and triangle strips are rasterized as filled triangles
- **MaterialParameterTypes.TriangleFillMode.lines**: Triangles and triangle strips are rasterized as lines

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable

items.description: Triangles and triangle strips are rasterized as filled triangles
items.name: MaterialParameterTypes.TriangleFillMode.fill

items.description: Triangles and triangle strips are rasterized as lines
